title: VP Spaces Grandeur
hc:
VP Spaces Grandeur is a well established housing venture based in Alwar Bypass Road Bhiwadi. This endeavor is strategically built on a favorable area which is directly linked to many primary places in Bhiwadi. In the last few years the area has experienced many developments when you look at the infrastructure and various other public utilities compared to nearby suburbs.


VP Spaces Grandeur provides well crafted residences of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK flats in a comfortable living space. Every residential unit available here include sufficient useable space in the combined developed area range of 650 to 1500 sq ft each. These units have premium indoor specs along with skillful planning and structure. Also, its well put house windows and spacious balconies will make sure good ventilation and natural light inside each residence.


VP Spaces Grandeur furthermore presents a calm outdoor gated area with an abundance of beneficial amenities and services. These outdoor specs comprise of landscaped gardens and enough open green area offering dedicated walking and jogging trails, with sufficient parking area. The project provides a number of superior quality amenities such as a modern Clubhouse, pool as well as other indoor and outdoor games facilities. Furthermore, the group has ensured a comfortable living space with full electricity backup and round the clock water supply. Safety at this venture is guaranteed by modern equipment and planning like RCC framed structures, CCTV vigilance, fire fighting systems and adequate manned patrolling in the residential compound.


This project is built by V P Spaces, a reliable group in the real-estate sector of Bhiwadi. The Group has delivered wide range of housing and commercial ventures throughout the city and their staff is known for strenuous and timely work.
